Summary I’m a young software testing professional with eight years of software development related experience. Most of my experience comes from the field of mobile software testing (~7 years). Before that I was working on both web application development using Perl and software development using C# on .NET platform (~1.5 years). 
 
At Intel I have been working as a Reliability Validation Architect on Android and Windows platforms. In this role I have worked with multiple testing teams, coordinating the reliability validation activities. I have also been actively involved in developing a new type of end user oriented test method that utilizes model based testing concepts. 
 
Before joining Intel I was working with Audio software test planning and test automation on the Windows Phone platform. I was at the spearhead of WP test automation at Nokia from the start. I also designed and developed a system for automatic audio verification. In addition to testing, I was involved with software building and continuous integration. On the side, I was developing and maintaining a test reporting web service running on Linux. 
 
Even though I'm working in the field of SW testing, I am somewhat developer spirited, and passionate about delivering great products to the end user. I am not afraid of hardware or the soldering iron. Over the years, I’ve also built some simple electronics, and other physical devices for testing purposes. 
 
 
Skillset: 
- Testing on the system, middleware and driver level. Specialized in System level Reliability & Performance testing on mobile platforms.  
- Test team leading 
- Testing process, methodology, and asset design 
- Test automation development and coordination  
- Model Based Testing 
- Build Automation 
- Continous Integration with test automation 
- Scripting, programming 
 
Technologies: 
- Python, Perl, Ruby, LotusScript, Visual Basic and Excel VBA, Shell, Powershell, Batch, Qt/C++, Java, C/C++, C# for .NET Framework, (X)HTML/CSS, PHP, SQL, JavaScript, Flash Summary I’m a young software testing professional with eight years of software development related experience.
